notes.text:
This update for tiff fixes the following issues:

Fixed multiple out of bounds read/write security issues:

  CVE-2023-0795 (bsc#1208226), CVE-2023-0796 (bsc#1208227), CVE-2023-0797 (bsc#1208228),
  CVE-2023-0798 (bsc#1208229), CVE-2023-0799 (bsc#1208230), CVE-2023-0800 (bsc#1208231),
  CVE-2023-0801 (bsc#1208232), CVE-2023-0802 (bsc#1208233), CVE-2023-0803 (bsc#1208234),
  CVE-2023-0804 (bsc#1208236).

notes.text: LibTIFF 4.4.0 has an out-of-bounds read in tiffcrop in tools/tiffcrop.c:3488, allowing attackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fix is available with commit afaabc3e.

notes.text: LibTIFF 4.4.0 has an out-of-bounds write in tiffcrop in tools/tiffcrop.c:3609, allowing attackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fix is available with commit 33aee127.
